title: Why was there was a helicopter with a spotlight circling around the bridge at Carloina Beach on Wednesday night around midnight?
text:
It's hard to say without some more information, but it may have been
the sheriff's department helicopter. There will be a lot of
helicopters in the area for the next few days. More
here:http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100421/ARTICLES/100429942/1017/news?Title=National-Guard-helicopters-to-fill-area-skies-starting-Friday
